current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit
		  Control Act of 1985 to provide that military technicians (dual status) shall be
		  included in military personnel accounts for purposes of any order issued under
		  that Act.

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following
			 bill; which was read twice and referred to the

quote.#text:
For purposes of this paragraph, military technicians (dual status) shall
			 be included in military personnel accounts.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended by adding at the end the following new sentence:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 251(a)(3) of
			 the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985/s:251/ss:a/p:3

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall apply to any order of the

to exempt military
			 personnel accounts from sequestration issued under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 255(f)(1) of the
			 Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985
